findings.title: QSP-3 Possible Truncation While Calculating Vault Deposits Shares
findings.description: The algorithm computes smaller shares every time LP rewards get higher, which can result in truncation of new deposits to the vault if initial deposit is low and LP rewards are significantly greater than initial LP deposit.

findings.title: QSP-6 Potential Division by an Extremely Small Value
findings.description: The `SushiStakingV2Strategy.depositIntoChef(...)` calls `_compound()` before reaching the block in which the following calculation is performed. If `poolData.totalLp` is an extremely small value, this may lead to an extremely large value being stored in the `shares` variable.
